explains: n. 女英雄；女主角，女主人公；女偶像；（神话和传说中的）女超人

sentences.en: The heroine is played by Demi Moore.
sentences.cn: 女主角由黛米•摩尔扮演。

sentences.en: The heroine made her exit to great applause.
sentences.cn: 女主角在热烈的掌声中退场。

sentences.en: She was well fitted to the role of tragic heroine.
sentences.cn: 她很适合演悲剧女主角。
